channel.title: Trouble with I.P. easyrsc rscd
channel.description: so i put my computers ip 192.168.*.** in server.java went back to client settings put my whatismyip.com ip in that also put in my distributed servers settings i go to run and don't work, says my server is online when i start it up but when i click login on client it says connection refused: connect idk what this problem could be pretty sure iv'e did everything right umm...idk am i doing somthing wrong?

item.title: Trouble with I.P. easyrsc rscd
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

What firewall are you using btw??

If you compiled and you done the settings correct you should be good to go… But mine was a firewall issure, Had to find it out on my own, I was using NOD32…Sucks too! I use G-Data Total Control and its fine now… I don’t know too much of this but I do knw mine was the firewall issue. Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble with I.P. easyrsc rscd

item.description:
@remenissions wrote:

I am having the same problem My server is up and looking fine, But it still says connection refused. I kinda figured it had something to do with my firewall aswell. You find anything out?

item.title: Trouble with I.P. easyrsc rscd
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

When using vista, in order to use the cmd prompt u have to run it as an administrator which can be done by rick clicking on the cmd prompt and then clicking run as admin, then you can type is ipconfig to get your default gateway.

Read full topic

@skarletdeath wrote:

my cmd i type ipconfig and dont recongize command idk if its because im running vista or what but idk still not working i jus need someone that truly knows what they doin to help cause iv did everything i can do but i won’t be able get back on til later rehab blahhh…but if anyone could help or if anyone thinks they could help solve this problem id like that alot thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble with I.P. easyrsc rscd
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

well if u have everything port forwarded lets pk said look at ur default gateway. sometimes mine changes so its not always the same as accessing ur router. goto cmd and type ipconfig see what ur default is and put that in server.java and ur whatismyip in client settings and dont forget to compile everything when u added ur ips

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @skarletdeath skarletdeath
item.description:
@skarletdeath wrote:

iv’e did that i put my computers ip 192.168.*.** in server.java were local host was i put my other ip in client side and distributed side (for friends to log on) and iv’e been port fowarding the ip i put in server.java everything is right am i wrong?

Here i got a pic of the error it shows me

item.title: Trouble with I.P. easyrsc rscd
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

Put your default gateway IP in server.java (Were “localhost” is located) and your IP address from www.whatsmyip.org in the setting.ini (client side)

Someone correct me if im wrong.

Read full topic
